channel.title: Tops on Median Watch
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Median Watch

item.description: Adrian Barnett I am a statistician working at Queensland University of Technology. I am a past president of the Statistical Society of Australia. I am the current president of the Association for Interdisciplinary Meta-Research and Open Science. I am interested in improving the quality of research, in particular how researchers use statistics and how research is funded.

These are some abandoned ideas that are free for others to re-use. These were things that I thought about, but now no longer have the time to pursue. Some of them are getting a bit old, and I haven’t checked to see if they have already been published by others. I stole this idea from the economist Paul Frijters who put his own abandoned ideas on his blog. I use the same approach as Paul:
